alert.bad_request:
Oops! Looks like something went wrong. Please try again. 

Contact sfhousing.info@sfgov.org if you're still experiencing issues.
alert.timeout_please_try_again: Oops! Looks like something went wrong. Please try again.

footer.for_general_questions: For general program inquiries, you may call MOHCD at 415-701-5500.

leasing_agent.due_to_high_call_volume: Due to high call volume you may hear a message.

callout.title: See more listings from our community partners.

apply.applications_must_be_received_by_deadlin: Applications must be received by the deadline and postmarks will not be considered.
apply.drop_off_application_or_mail: Drop Off Application or Send by US Mail
apply.paper_applications_must_be_mailed: Paper applications must be sent by US Mail and cannot be submitted in person.

listings.available_units_and_waitlist_desc: Once applicants fill all available units, additional applicants will be placed on the waitlist for {{number}} units
listings.developmental_disabilities_description: A portion number of units in this building are set aside for persons with developmental disabilities. Please visit housingchoices.org for information on eligibility, requirements, how to get an application and for answers to any other questions you may have about the process.
listings.enter_lottery_for_waitlist: Submit an application for an open slot on the waitlist for {{number}} units.
listings.for_income_calculations: For income calculations, household size includes everyone (all ages) living in the unit.
listings.no_available_units: There are no available units at this time.
listings.no_open_listings: No listings currently have open applications.
listings.occupancy_description_all_sro: Occupancy for this building is limited to 1 person per unit.
listings.occupancy_description_no_sro: Occupancy limits for this building differ from household size, and do not include children under 6.
listings.occupancy_description_some_sro: Occupancy for this building varies by unit type. SROs are limited to 1 person per unit, regardless of age. For all other unit types, occupancy limits do not count children under 6.
listings.priority_units_description: This building has units set aside if any of the following apply to you or someone in your household:
listings.remaining_units_after_preference_conside: After all preference holders have been considered, any remaining units will be available to qualified applicants.
listings.reserved_units_description: In order to qualify for these units one of the following must apply to you or someone in your household:
listings.single_room_occupancy_description: This property offers single rooms for one person only. Tenants may share bathrooms, and sometimes kitchen facilities.
listings.units_have_accessibility_features_for: These units have accessibility features for people with {{type}}.

upcoming_lotteries.no_results: There are no closed listings with upcoming lotteries at this time.
upcoming_lotteries.title: Closed Listings

listings.cc&r_description: The CC&R's explain the rules of the homeowners' association, and restrict how you can modify the property.
listings.view_additional_housing_opportunities_he: See more rental and ownership housing opportunities

lottery.applications_that_qualify_for_preference: Applications that qualify for this preference will be given a higher priority in the lottery.

nav.get_feedback: This is a preview of our new website. We're just getting started. We'd love to get your feedback.

welcome.all_application_closed: All applications are currently closed, but you can view closed listings.
welcome.title: Apply for affordable housing in
